commitResults.messageTitle: Level-3, A-TextUiTesting Mark as Done Created a separate class Task to represent a task list
Implement increment Level-4 ToDo, Event, Deadline
Duke Level 5 Handle Errors ++ Added Exception Handling DukeException for the following scenarios 1. User input 'todo' - Without any task 2. User input gibberish input - Throws exception
commitResults.messageBody:
++ Code refactoring of done task
- Added exception handling if done task input is invalid

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix bug todo task string is appended with task
1st iteration - Storage Class - Able to read duke/data/tasks.txt -Able to create directory and file if it does not exists

commitResults.messageBody:
+ Main Feature added for Storage load - Reads in the task.txt and translate into multiple Tasks within the parent class TaskList.
+ Made Task class an abstract class

New Classes
+TaskList
+TaskListDecoder

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 7 - Ui Class + Move showWelcome in newly created Ui Class
Level 7 Implement Ui messages to be shown to the user + Take in input by user

commitResults.messageBody:
1. Added following command classes for main functionality of Duke

+ AddDeadlineCommand
+ AddEventCommand
+ AddToDoCommand
+ DeleteTaskCommand
+ ExitCommand
+ ListCommand

2. Organise Command Classes into it's own commands package

3. Command made as abstract class

4. Command to be read of by CommandEnums
----------------------------
5. Organise Ui Class to be it it's own 'Ui' package
----------------------------
6. Organise TaskList Classes in 'data' package

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 7 - A-More OOP * Reallocate and rename project target folder to duke
commitResults.messageBody:
Reallocate classes into respective packages
+ duke/data
+ duke/parser
+ duke/storage
+ duke/common

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 7 - A more OOP + Implement Storage Save() Feature

Level 7 A-More OOP + Implement DeleteTaskCommand + Fix bug whereby Deadline and Event Task was not saved properly upon deletion - saveAllTask(List<Task> allTask) + Introduce getBy method for Deadline and Event Tasks respectively
commitResults.messageBody: + Code refactoring rename of ui printToDo method to printAddSingleTask

commitResults.messageTitle: Level 7 A-MoreOOP + Code Refactoring for UI class + Newly added DoneTaskCommand to cater for Done Task feature + Fix bugs in Parser - Regex now takes in /by - deadline /at - event

Level-8 Dates and Time + Store Task attributes as date objects (Minimal) + Implement Find command - Allow user to find deadline/events occurring on a specific date (Stretch goal)   	- Additional FindTaskByDateCommand class file - Remove unnecessary class file 'GreetEchoExit' - Remove unnecessary class file 'TaskAction' (Previously CommandEnum) - Remove unnecessary class file 'addList' Previously Duke main

Level 8 A-JavaDoc Add JavaDoc comments to the code. +Minimal: Add header comments to at least half of the non-private classes/methods. +Stretch goal: Add header comments to all non-private classes/methods, and non-trivial private methods. (Best Effort)
Level 8 - Rename source folder back from Duke back to correct convention java
